More Info
Tailgate Gallery
More Info
/
LGBTQ+ Virtual Reunion Weekend, April 9-11
Eventbrite Page
with Three Reunion Events
Friday "Happy Hour" Mixer (
Register Here
)
Mix and mingle with your fellow LGBTQ+ Ags and allies -- plus surprise guests and couple of drag performances.
Saturday Virtual Reunion & Drag Show (
Register Here
)
Connect with fellow LGBTQ+ Ags in break out rooms -- followed by a drag show with several of your favorite performers from multiple cities. Drag performers confirmed so far: Hu'Nee B, Sasha Frost, Deaven Lee, and Sir Loin Long... With more performers to be announced soon!
Sunday Virtual Drag Brunch (
Register Here
)
Be entertained while seeing if our drag performers "Nailed It" in the kitchen as well as on the virtual stage!
Aggie Pride Membership
RD Parallax
Monthly Donation
Please join as a paid member to support Aggie Pride's programs and the resources we provide for LGBTQ+ Aggies. Without your support, Aggie Pride would not exist and we would not be able to support LGBTQ+ Aggies both in Aggieland and around the world. One hundred percent of all donations to Aggie Pride go to support LGBTQ+ Aggies.
Donate
Resources

Texas A&M Helpline: 1(979) 845-2700
Trevor Project Helpline:
1(866) 488-7836
National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 1(800) 273-8255
LGBT National Hotline:
1(888) 843-4564

Leadership
Brad   Dressler
Brad Dressler (he/him/his) is the current President of Aggie Pride. A dedicated diversity advocate, he is working hard for gender equity, LGBTQ inclusion, and representation of marginalized groups. Currently based in the San Francisco Bay Area, he is a marketing leader with years of expertise who excels at developing short and long-term strategies to exceed goals and drive growth for both B2C and B2B companies.
About Us
Aggie Pride is the LGBTQ and Ally Former Student Network of Texas A&M University. If you are a former student, current student, faculty, staff, or part of the Aggie Family, and want to support the LGBTQ+ community at Texas A&M (plus connect and network with LGBTQ+ Aggies in other cities), then please join Aggie Pride and stay connected.
Join the Aggie Pride list
to learn about upcoming events and important news!
Sign Up
Stay connected and support the Aggie Family! This network is composed of former students, current students, faculty, staff and friends of Texas A&M University working  together to provide support and a welcoming environment for LGBTQ students, faculty and staff at Texas A&M.
Sign Up
Aggie Pride
Contact Us
If you wish to join the Aggie Pride email list, please
sign up here
. We only send about one email per month. Gig 'em!
